class_notes: The Practicum course must be completed within an academic semester. A minimum of 2.5 hours/week and no more than 20 hours/week during the fall semester is required for the practical experience.  The goals are to gain practical experience related to an academic focus within the workplace environment, acquire or expand knowledge of the industry, identify areas for future knowledge and skill development and receive feedback on the integration of academic knowledge and communication skills in the workplace.  A final paper is required in which the student discusses knowledge from coursework that was applied in the work environment.  Students should include concepts, analytical tools and techniques and how they used them to address business questions and analyze complex business questions.
prerequisites: This section is reserved for students in the One-Year or Two-Year MBA program.
